thread.title: Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Akins Share Gender Reveal With Fans -- Is it a Boy or Girl?
thread.title_full: Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Akins Share Gender Reveal With Fans -- Is it a Boy or Girl?

author: Emily Krauser
title: Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Akins Share Gender Reveal With Fans -- Is it a Boy or Girl?
text: Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Akins Share Gender Reveal With Fans -- Is it a Boy or Girl? by Emily Krauser 4:00 PM PST, February 19, 2017 Playing Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Akins Share Gender Reveal With Fans -- Is it a Boy or Girl? Thomas Rhett clearly has babies on the brain! The "Die a Happy Man" singer and his wife, Lauren Akins, recently announced that they're expecting two children -- Akins is pregnant, and they are adopting from Africa. Excited to share their journey to parenthood with fans, the happy couple took to Instagram to post about their gender reveal party on Saturday. A post shared by Lauren Akins (@laur_akins) on Feb 18, 2017 at 11:55am PST Rhett, 26, had the honor of cutting the cake, which meant he, of course, took his time in order to keep his family and friends in anticipation for just a few moments longer. Everyone then jumped for joy when he pulled out a piece of pink cake. "We're having a girl!" Rhett happily announced. A post shared by Lauren Akins (@laur_akins) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:32pm PST The country crooner is clearly excited about having a daughter, as seen in this delightful video of him hair flipping while donning a bubblegum pink wig: A post shared by Lauren Akins (@laur_akins) on Feb 18, 2017 at 6:46pm PST WATCH: Madonna Granted Adoption Order for 2 More Children by Judge in Malawi Rhett and Akins just announced they were expecting on Wednesday, which was just as adorable as their gender reveal. A post shared by ThomasRhettAkins (@thomasrhettakins) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:20am PST Find out more about their two impending bundles of joy in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
